name: Swashbuckler
description: Swashbucklers rely on speed, charm, and daring maneuvers to outfight their enemies in single combat.

3.name: Fancy Footwork
3.description: When you make a melee attack against a creature, that creature canâ€™t make opportunity attacks against you for the rest of your turn.

3.name: Rakish Audacity
3.description: You gain a bonus to your initiative rolls equal to your Charisma modifier. In addition, you can use Sneak Attack even if no ally is adjacent to the target, provided you are within 5 feet of it and no other enemies are within 5 feet of you.

9.name: Panache
9.description: You can use your Charisma (Persuasion) check to charm or goad a creature into focusing on you.

13.name: Elegant Maneuver
13.description: As a bonus action, you can gain advantage on the next Dexterity (Acrobatics) or Strength (Athletics) check you make during the same turn.

17.name: Master Duelist
17.description: If you miss with an attack roll, you can reroll it with advantage. You can use this feature once per short or long rest.
